perfsonarserver.database

Class Cache

  • java.lang.Object
    • perfsonarserver.database.Cache

  • public class Cache
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for handling cache with chunks
    Author:
    Benjamin Konrad, Sascha Degener

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cache

        public Cache(int cacheSectorSizeHours,
     int cacheDeleteDays)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        cacheMaxDays - maximum days to be precached
        cacheSectorSizeHours - size of a cache sector (hours) 1-24
        cacheDeleteDays - days until cache sector should be dropped (no access)

    • Method Detail

      • delayJitterLossDataCheckCache

        public boolean delayJitterLossDataCheckCache(java.lang.String serviceName,
                                    long start,
                                    long end,
                                    java.lang.String srcInterface,
                                    java.lang.String destInterface,
                                    boolean updateCache)
                                      throws CacheEmptyException
        Checks whether chunks are precached or not, insert data into database if not cached and "updateCache" = true
        Parameters:
        serviceName - service name
        start - start time in milliseconds
        end - end time in milliseconds
        srcInterface - source interface
        destInterface - destination interface
        updateCache - request data if not cached?
        Returns:
        all chunks are precached?
        Throws:
        CacheEmptyException

      • delayJitterLossInterfaceCheck

        public void delayJitterLossInterfaceCheck(java.lang.String serviceName)
        Checks Interface cache and uses method to update (ONLY if no data available or data too old!) must be improved to chunks too because server only gives interface lists of time intervals)
        Parameters:
        serviceName - service name

      • delayJitterLossServiceCheck

        public void delayJitterLossServiceCheck()
        Gets all services from server (by now text file) if no services inside database or data too old.

      • deleteDelayJitterLossDataOldData

        public void deleteDelayJitterLossDataOldData()
        Delete old DelayJitterLoss Data. (first drop cachechunk then drop data of cachechunk)

        serviceName - service name
        Returns:
        service url
